entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and he is described as being prepared to bet everything he owns.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a teacher in the class, and she is described as gazing up at Harry with a serious expression.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another student in the class, and she is described as being loud and interrupting Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student in the class, and she is described as whispering something to Lavender.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a student in the class, and she is described as glaring at Hermione along with Parvati.

entities.name: grim
entities.description: The Grim is an omen that Professor Trelawney sees, and it is described as being a sign of bad news.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney gazed up at Harry with unmistakable anger.
Hermione interrupted Professor Trelawney, saying 'Oh, for goodness' sake!'
Hermione disagreed with Professor Trelawney, saying 'Not that ridiculous Grim again!'
Professor Trelawney stood up and surveyed Hermione with unmistakable anger.
